Which of the following is an appropriate explanation of feedback control?

Choices.a: It performs control in a predetermined order.
Choices.b: The control amount is increased little by little with the target value.
Choices.c: It performs without being affected by external factors from affecting the output.
Choices.d: It performs control without using the output.
